Class Cineplex

java.lang.Object
moblima.Entity.Cineplex
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Cineplex extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a Cineplex Concrete base class that implements the Serializable interface.

    • deleteAllSessionsByMovieName

      public void deleteAllSessionsByMovieName(String movieName)
      Method to delete all the sessions available in the cineplex by Movie Name. This is used when a movie is removed, so it implies that the session must be deleted too.
      Parameters:
      movieName - The name of the movie that is linked to any sessions in the cineplex

    • deleteSession

      public void deleteSession(Session session)
      Method to remove a particular session from a currently avaiable list of sessions of a cineplex. Used when staff configures the listings.
      Parameters:
      session - an instance of the class Session.
